tooltips.grossSales: Total sales amount before discounts and refunds are applied
tooltips.items: All item sales, excluding taxes, discounts, comps, and refunds
tooltips.serviceCosts: Service costs including integrated tips, surcharges, and other fees
tooltips.discounts: Discounts applied to orders, including promotions and coupons
tooltips.refunds: Refunds processed during the selected period
tooltips.netSales: Gross sales minus discounts and refunds (Gross sales - Discounts - Refunds)
tooltips.deferredSales: Total amount charged to customers for orders that are still open or pending payment
tooltips.taxes: Taxes collected on sales during the period
tooltips.tips: Tips received by staff during the period
tooltips.commissions: Platform, delivery, and other external service commissions
tooltips.totalSales: Net sales (taxes are already included in prices)
tooltips.totalCollected: Net sales + tips - commissions (actual cash flow)

reportType.label: Report type
reportType.description: View the report in hourly, daily, weekly or monthly intervals.
reportType.longDescription: Changing the report type will change how your data is displayed. Summary reports will show single total figures, while others may show changes by day, for example.

options.summaryDesc: Groups the same metrics from different days as total values, without segmenting them chronologically
options.hourlySumDesc: Groups metrics from different days by hour (e.g., all sales recorded between 9:00 and 9:59, between 10:00 and 10:59, etc.)
options.dailySumDesc: Groups metrics from different days by day of the week (e.g., all sales recorded on Tuesdays)
options.hoursDesc: Shows data for each hour of the selected period
options.daysDesc: Shows data for each day of the selected period
options.weeksDesc: Shows data for each week of the selected period
options.monthsDesc: Shows data for each month of the selected period

viewType.label: View
viewType.description: Change how your information is displayed
viewType.longDescription: Select how you want to visualize your report data.

terminal.label: Terminals
terminal.longDescription: Select which terminals to include in the report.

groupBy.label: Group metrics by
groupBy.description: Group metrics in the data table
groupBy.longDescription: Segment the report data by different criteria.

options.originDesc: Group by order type (dine-in, takeout, delivery)
options.channelDesc: Group by sales channel (TPV, QR, Web, App)
options.paymentMethodDesc: Group by payment type (cash, card, digital)
options.staffDesc: Group by cashier or server who processed the sale

filterBy.label: Filter by
filterBy.description: Show or hide data associated with different dimensions

metrics.label: Metrics
metrics.description: Choose which metrics to show in the report
metrics.longDescription: Selected metrics will be shown in the report and exports.
metrics.chartHint: The selected metric will be shown in the report. If you select the chart icon, it will modify the report visualization.

options.grossSalesDesc: Item sales, including modifiers and service costs
options.itemsDesc: All item sales, excluding taxes, discounts, comps, and refunds
options.serviceCostsDesc: Service costs including integrated tips, surcharges, and other fees
options.discountsDesc: Deductions applied to your sales for promotions, coupons, or comps
options.refundsDesc: All itemized refunds, excluding partial refunds
options.netSalesDesc: Gross sales minus refunds, discounts, and comps
options.deferredSalesDesc: Total charged for orders that are still open or pending payment
options.taxesDesc: Tax amount applied at the time of sale
options.tipsDesc: Tips received by staff during the period
options.commissionsDesc: Platform, delivery, and other external service commissions
options.totalCollectedDesc: Net sales plus taxes, tips, and other charges
